title: U.S., Iran complete round of talks as Trump weighs diplomacy against strikes
summary_full: The latest round of talks unfolded against the backdrop of the largest U.S. military buildup in the Middle East since the 2003 Iraq invasion.
summary_public: The latest round of talks unfolded against the backdrop of the largest U.S. military buildup in the Middle East since the 2003 Iraq invasion.
